subject: Re: Instant Messaging
msgSnippet: I m using the Quikscript Junior Windows Entry program.  I basically just launch that program, launch an IM window...  and configure that particular window to
messageBody:
I'm using the Quikscript Junior Windows Entry program. I basically
just launch that program, launch an IM window... and configure that
particular window to use ThothUni. I can type away in Quikscript!

The program allows me to "Ctrl-Space" to switch back to inefficient
english again, if need be...

My Yahoo! IM is "CJ_Carlisle", for anyone who wants to ping me there
and try it out. Moira, please feel free to chat with me there and
we can see about resolving your IM ThothUni configuration via IM...
then we'll post our tips and results back to the group.

I type daily journals in Quikscript, and my entire Daytimer is in
Quikscript. I'm very accustomed to writing and typing it now. I
need practice reading it more, and what better way than a real time
conversation!!

Thanks!

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Moira O'Brien" <mj@...> wrote:
>
> Update - I can use Thoth.ttf OK in Adium but ThothUni just
returns standard
> script.
>
> Moira
>
> 2008/10/18 Moira O'Brien <moirajaneob@...>
>
> > Hi CJ
> >
> > How did you get Trillian to accept ThothUni? I tried it in
Adium (which is
> > the Mac equivalent) and it doesn't seem to work. I can get my
handwriting
> > font to display OK, but not Thoth.
> >
> > Has anyone else had any experience of Thoth on Mac OS X?
> >
> > Moira
> >
> > Moira O'Brien Photography
> > Member SWPP/BPPA
> >
> > www.moiraobrien.com www.corkphotographer.net
> > www.photographers-united.com www.corkcameragroup.net
> > www.moirajane.net
> >
> > Tel +353 876-214532 eFax: +44 8701-337953
> >
> > Mailto://mj@...
> > Messengers:
> > Yahoo: moira_ob MSN: mj@... Skype: MoiraJane Googletalk
> > Moirajaneob
> >
> >
> > 2008/10/17 cj_carlisle <cj_carlisle@...>
> >
> > Greetings, All!
> >>
> >> I am interested in chatting over an Instant Messaging platform
using
> >> Quickscript. I have scoured the message board and cannot find
any
> >> reference to Instant Messaging throughout.
> >>
> >> Is anyone else interested in this form of "Conversational
Quickscript"?
> >>
> >> If so, I am currently able to use Thoth Uni in my IM
application. (I
> >> use Trillian.) I am on both AIM's and Yahoo!'s services.
> >>
> >> I am from the Southeastern US, so I have a bit of a drawl which
may
> >> show up in some of my Quickscript.
> >>
> >> I look forward to chatting!
> >>
> >> -CJ
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >
> >
>
